title: Check out our amazing location! 1 bed, 1 bath. Tara Bridge Apartments
posting_body: ['Welcome to Tara Bridge Apartments', 'Rental Information', 'Pricing:', '$1351/Month | 1', 'Bedroom 1 Bath | 700 sq ft', 'Lease Term:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities', '● Air Conditioning/Heating', '● Carpet', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Dining Room', '● Disposal', '● Oven', '● Range', '● Refrigerator/Freezer', '● Tub/Shower', '● Window Coverings', '● Additional Storage', '● Hardwood Floors', '● Neutral Palette Accomodates All Styles', '● Private Patio and Balcony', '● Sunny Apartment Homes / Fireplaces in Select Homes', '● Trash Compactor', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Washer/Dryer Hookup', 'Community Features', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Courtyard', '● Fitness Center', '● Laundry Facilities', '● Maintenance on site', '● Playground', '● Property Manager on Site', '● Public Transportation', '● Close to I-75 / Easy Access to Hartsfield Airport,Military Bases & Shopping', '● Controlled Building Access', '● Gorgeous Pool', '● Online Services', '● On-Site Professional Staff', '● Picnic Areas with BBQ Grills', 'About Community', 'Description:', 'Tara Bridge Apartments boasts Amenities that make living here both comfortable and convenient.', 'Work out in our fitness center, relax by the pool or enjoy a game of tennis on the tennis court.', 'A spacious sunning deck perfect for grilling or picnicking is available.', 'You can also enjoy a leisurely walk around the community as it is nestled amongst canopies of trees and other natural surroundings.', 'This home features large living and bedroom spaces with loads of natural light.', 'Location:', '1 Magnolia Circle', 'Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Additional Information', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Our Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '1353811EBFB0474']
